comment: Excluded middle law for closed subspaces, which is equivalent to (and derived from) the orthomodular law ~ dihoml4 . Lemma 3.3(2) in [Holland95] p. 215. In our proof, we use the variables ` X ` , ` M ` , ` p ` , ` q ` , ` r ` in place of Hollands' l, m, P, Q, L respectively. ( ~ pexmidALTN analog.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
